newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine Central Bank cuts special T-bill rates.
newsitem.headline: Philippine Central Bank cuts special T-bill rates.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Tuesday it had cut the interest rates on its special 85-day and 169-day Treasury bills to a uniform 10.65 percent.
On Monday, the 85-day bill rate was at 10.70 percent, while the 169-day bill rate was at 11.0 percent.
The rate cut came a day after T-bill rates slipped further during the regular Monday auction due to oversubscription.
The central bank's special T-bills are available to banks on an over-the-counter basis.
